Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster C." appears on the bottom left of the poster; "G 12" appears on the bottom right of poster.  Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to form war savings associations and buy war savings certificates. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
